languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили сообщение из оперативного штаба {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Арбитес{/g} на Даргонусе. {g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}Проктор{/g} Соломон Антар ссылается на договор о протекторате с Ее Светлостью Теодорой и просит аудиенции. Что прикажете ответить?"
languages.translation_comment:
спикер: Вигдис
не видели RM_ArbitesFirstMeeting_dialogue.jbp (1ad158ff9ead448d9b7d730f954829fa)
Вигдис

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили сообщение из оперативного штаба {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Арбитес{/g} на Даргонусе. {g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}Проктор{/g} Соломон Антар ссылается на договор о протекторате с Ее Светлостью Теодорой и просит аудиенции. Что прикажете ответить?"

languages.translation_comment:
спикер: Вигдис
не видели RM_ArbitesFirstMeeting_dialogue.jbp (1ad158ff9ead448d9b7d730f954829fa)
Вигдис

languages.text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили сообщение из оперативного штаба {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Арбитес{/g} на Даргонусе. Проктор Соломон Антар ссылается на договор о протекторате с Ее Светлостью Теодорой и просит аудиенции. Что прикажете ответить?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from the Adeptus Arbites base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

"Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from the Adeptus Arbites base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

"Lord Captain, we have received a vox-cast from the Adeptus Arbites base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

"Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

"Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

"Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido una transmisión de la base de operaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} en Dargonus. El Procurador Solomorne Anthar invoca un pacto establecido con milady Theodora y solicita una audiencia. ¿Cómo quiere responder?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido una transmisión de la base de operaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} en Dargonus. El Procurador Solomorne Anthar invoca un pacto establecido con milady Theodora y solicita una audiencia. ¿Cómo quiere responder?».

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们收到了一条来自达戈努斯的信息，是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}的总部发来的。索罗蒙·安萨监察官声称，法务部曾与西奥多拉夫人达成了协定，请求与我们见面。我们应当如何回应？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们收到了一条来自达戈努斯的信息，是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}的总部发来的。索罗蒙·安萨监察官声称，法务部曾与西奥多拉夫人达成了协定，请求与我们见面。我们应当如何回应？”
“舰长大人，我们收到了一条来自达戈努斯的音阵信息，是帝国法务部的总部发来的。索罗蒙·安萨监察官声称，法务部曾与西奥多拉夫人达成了协定，请求与我们见面。我们应当如何回应？”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu une transmission en provenance du quartier général de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} sur Dargonus. Le proctor Solomorne Anthar demande audience en vertu d'un pacte conclu avec Sa Seigneurie Théodora. Que devons-nous lui répondre ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu une transmission en provenance du quartier général de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} sur Dargonus. Le proctor Solomorne Anthar demande audience en vertu d'un pacte conclu avec Sa Seigneurie Théodora. Que devons-nous lui répondre ? »

« {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu une transmission-vox en provenance du quartier général de l'Adeptus Arbites sur Dargonus. Le proctor Solomorne Anthar demande audience en vertu d'un pacte conclu avec Sa Seigneurie Théodora. Que devons-nous lui répondre ? »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン。ダルゴナスにある{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}高等裁定局{/g}の基地から通信がありました。ソロモーン・アンサール代理人がレディ・シオドーラとの協定に従って謁見を求めております。どうなさいますか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン。ダルゴナスにある{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}高等裁定局{/g}の基地から通信がありました。ソロモーン・アンサール代理人がレディ・シオドーラとの協定に従って謁見を求めております。どうなさいますか？」
「ロード・キャプテン、私たちはダルゴナスのアデプトゥス・アルビテスの作戦本部からヴォックスメッセージを受け取りました。代理人ソロモーン・アンサールは、レディ・シオドーラと結んだ協定を発動させようとして、支持者を求めています。我々はどう対応しましょうか？」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Dargonus'taki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} harekât üssünden bir voks yayını aldık. Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar, Leydi Theodora Hazretleri ile yapmış oldukları bir anlaşmayı hatırlattı ve sizinle görüşmek istedi. Ne yanıt verelim?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Dargonus'taki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} harekât üssünden bir voks yayını aldık. Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar, Leydi Theodora Hazretleri ile yapmış oldukları bir anlaşmayı hatırlattı ve sizinle görüşmek istedi. Ne yanıt verelim?"

"Lord Kaptan, Dargonus'taki Adeptus Arbites harekât üssünden bir voks yayını aldık. Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar, Leydi Theodora Hazretleri ile yapmış oldukları bir anlaşmayı hatırlattı ve sizinle görüşmek istedi. Ne yanıt verelim?"

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Übertragung aus der Operationsbasis der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} auf Dargonus erhalten. Proktor Solomorne Anthar bittet unter Berufung auf einen Pakt mit Ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora um eine Audienz. Was sollen wir ihm antworten?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} base of operations on Dargonus. Proctor Solomorne Anthar is invoking a pact made with Her Ladyship Theodora and asks for an audience. How are we to respond?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Übertragung aus der Operationsbasis der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} auf Dargonus erhalten. Proktor Solomorne Anthar bittet unter Berufung auf einen Pakt mit Ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora um eine Audienz. Was sollen wir ihm antworten?"
